meanings.definition: Enzymes that catalyze the hydrolysis of glucuronides.
meanings.sent1: Glucuronidases help break down glucuronides in the body.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study glucuronidases to understand how they work in the body.
meanings.sent3: The glucuronidases at the party were busy breaking down all the glucuronides in the snacks.
meanings.sent4: In the world of enzymes, glucuronidases are the efficient cleaners, breaking down everything in their path.
meanings.sent5: Imagine tiny glucuronidases as little workers, diligently breaking apart glucuronides to keep your body healthy.

meanings.definition: Proteins involved in the metabolism of drugs and other xenobiotics.
meanings.sent1: Doctors rely on glucuronidases to help process medications in the body.
meanings.sent2: Athletes should be aware of how glucuronidases can affect the breakdown of substances in their system.
meanings.sent3: The glucuronidases in the lab were joking about how they were the drug metabolism superheroes.
meanings.sent4: Like molecular chefs, glucuronidases carefully prepare drugs for elimination from the body.
meanings.sent5: The role of glucuronidases in drug metabolism is crucial for maintaining a healthy balance in the body.

meanings.definition: Biomolecules that play a role in the breakdown of complex carbohydrates.
meanings.sent1: Glucuronidases are essential for breaking down complex carbohydrates into simpler forms.
meanings.sent2: Nutritionists study how glucuronidases aid in the digestion of complex carbohydrates.
meanings.sent3: The glucuronidases in the digestive system were having a race to see who could break down the most complex carbohydrates.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra of digestion, glucuronidases are the maestros conducting the breakdown of complex carbohydrates.
meanings.sent5: Picture glucuronidases as tiny scissors, snipping away at complex carbohydrates to make them easier for the body to absorb.
